title: Bug 7945 - Search Results Not Selected in External Jar
description: In Build 200201151, when searching for references to a field in an external JAR, the first match is not automatically selected upon double-clicking.
OB: The observed behavior is that when double-clicking on a search result, the first match is not selected in the external JAR.
EB: I expected that when double-clicking on a search result, the first match in the external JAR would be selected as it should be.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:
1. Ensure that you have JDK 1.3.1 as the default JRE and have the source for rt.jar.
2. Open the 'java.io.File' class.
3. Select the field 'tmpFir'.
4. Perform a search for references to this field. Double-click on the search result to observe that the first match is not selected as expected.
